Select objects in the canvas or browser to add to the list of derived objects. When you select a component, all objects in the component are included. Click the X button in the dialog to remove selected objects from the list.

Description._LCLZText: Use Derive to maintain common parameters in a single design and reuse them in multiple other designs design.

TextBlock._LCLZText: Insert another design into the current document.
If the other design is modified, its changes will show in the current document.
Show Insert Design
Hide Insert Design
Opens a design or drawing from your projects or local computer.
Select a design or drawing from the project browser and click Open, or click “Open from my computer” and select a supported file.
Capture Position
Captures the positions of recently moved/rotated components as an event in your timeline. This information is used by geometry and assemble commands.
Use this if you intend to continue modeling/assembling while keeping components at their current positions.
Revert Position
Returns the components to the previous position and rotation.
Assign Item Number
Assign unique item numbers to selected components for tracking throughout their life cycles.
Items are set to “unreleased” and are accessible in Fusion Manage.
Quick Release
Transitions the component to the next life cycle state or revision without a change order.
The final release still requires a change order. This only works on the top level component or external references - not internal components.
Release with Change Order
Releases the selected components with a change order.
Includes full audit trail and approval workflow. Internal components and external references are supported.
Bill of Materials
Opens the bill of materials for this design.
(May not be available in some situations, such as when viewing a configured design, or when Fusion is offline.)
Opens the Fusion Manage Dashboard in your default browser.
The Dashboard is a central place where you can access your Fusion Manage information, such as charts and outstanding work.
Opens Fusion Manage in your default browser and shows the Details page for the currently selected item.
If the current selection is not assigned as an item in Fusion Manage, the list of items and BOMs is shown.
Change Orders
Opens Fusion Manage in your default browser and shows change order information for the currently selected item.
If the current selection is not assigned as an item in Fusion Manage, the list of change orders is shown.
Creates a shareable link so that viewers can download the design, view it online, or share it with others.
You can protect the link with a password; the design can be viewed in the cloud even without Fusion installed.

Tips._LCLZText: Use the Reference Objects command to explicitly reference objects in an assembly before starting detailed design work.

Description._LCLZText: To make detailed design work clearer and easier to perform, reference only the objects in the assembly that are important for a component in context.

TextBlock._LCLZText: Make Design Read-Only
Current Status: Savable
Click to make the design temporarily read-only for you.
Other project members can reserve the design.
Make Design Savable
Current Status: Read-Only
Click to make the design savable again.
You can reserve the design and save pending changes.
Replaces an external component in an assembly with a different external design.
In the dialog, navigate to and select a different external design. Check Replace All Instances if you want to replace all identical instances of the selected component in the assembly.
Replaces an external component in an assembly with a different external design.
In the dialog, navigate to and select a different external design. Check Replace All Instances if you want to replace all identical instances of the selected component in the assembly.
Inserts a fastener into the active document.

Use a combination of searching, filtering and browsing to locate a fastener, adjust the settings, and select a geometry (an edge, a face, a sketch point, an existing fastener) or place a fastener anywhere in the canvas to position it.

Tips._LCLZText: Click to expand the list and select a desired fastener. Adjust the fastener settings, such as size or material, and set the position in the active document.

TextBlock._LCLZText: Switches the configured component to a different configuration.
Saves the latest version of a Configured Design as a new Configured Design document.
Select the location to save the copy, enter a new name, then click Save.
Saves the latest version of the active Configuration as a separate Standard Design document. Excludes related data from other environments.
Select the location to save the copy, enter a new name, then click Save.
